Tempo e giorni della settimana.english: Time and Days of the Week

words.en: to tidy up, to pick up
to manage to, to succeed in
to deal with, to be involved with
good luck (literally: into the wolf’s mouth)
to be broke (literally: to be at the green)

words.it: prendere due piccioni con una fava
words.en: to kill two birds with one stone

words.it: fare il passo più lungo della gamba
words.en: to bite off more than you can chew
to be a spendthrift (literally: to have holes in your hands)

words.it: mettere il carro davanti ai buoi
words.en: to put the cart before the horse
to go smoothly, to prosper (literally: to sail with full sails)
to give someone a hard time
to speak frankly (literally: to not have hair on the tongue)

words.it: andare a letto con le galline
words.en: to go to bed early (literally: to go to bed with the hens)
to be very important (literally: to be like bread)
to jump from one topic to another
to skim off the top (to cheat financially)

words.it: stare con le mani in mano

words.en: to go haywire, to crash (e.g., a computer)
